x <- parole_adj_adv %>%
  filter(count > 100) %>%
  filter(pos = c("Adjective", "Adverb") %>%
  mutate(word = reorder(word, count)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(count, word)) +
  geom_col() +
  labs(y = NULL)
